title: Determining Events
text: The list of outcomes for an event A is all the possible outcomes that occur under that event. In this scenario, we can represent each outcome as one of each of the whole numbers that starts at one and is less than $$20$$ AND is even.

title: Determining the Outcomes
text: Knowing the definition of an event, what then, is the list of possible outcomes of whole numbers starting at one and less than $$20$$ that are even? What are the outcomes that together represent A?
